official-title.#text:
To amend the Housing and Community Development Act of
		  1974 to set-aside community development block grant amounts in each fiscal year
		  for grants to local chapters of veterans service organizations for
		  rehabilitation of their facilities.

cosponsor.#tail:
)
			 introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

No eligible veterans service organization

Any eligible veterans service organization
				that receives grant amounts under this subsection from amounts made available
				for a fiscal year shall be ineligible for any grant from any amounts made
				available for such grants for any of the succeeding 5 fiscal years.
